attentionMessage.message: When you start the extraction, if there's no path filters set, the extraction will map all internal links it can find within the website and its pages.

cssSelectorInputLabel.description: Label for CSS selector input field

addCssSelectorButton.description: Button text to add a new CSS selector

pathFilterInputLabel.description: Label for path filter input field

addPathFilterButton.description: Button text to add a new path filter

noPathFiltersTitle.description: Title for no path filters message

noPathFiltersMessage.message: No path filters set. The extraction will map all internal links it can find within the website and its pages untill it cannot find any more links it didn't already visited.

cancelExtraction.description: Button text to cancel ongoing extraction

extractionCompletedMessage.message: The data extraction has been completed successfully. You can now export the data or start a new extraction.
extractionCompletedMessage.description: Message shown when extraction is completed

pathFilterFormDescriptionTitle.description: Title for path filter form description

pathFilterFormDescription.message: Path filters are used to filter the links that will be extracted, this extension only extracts internal links from the target website. The path filters will set a condition that the link must match to be extracted (e.g. /blog/ will only extract links that contain /blog/ in the path).

cssSelectorFormDescriptionTitle.description: Title for CSS selector form description

cssSelectorFormDescription.message: CSS selectors are used to select the elements that will be extracted from the website. The CSS selectors are a strategy to retrieve specific elements from the website, this extension will use the CSS selectors to extract custom data from the website.

noDataTitle.message: You haven't extracted any data yet

noDataDescription.message: You haven't extracted any data yet. Please start an extraction to see the reports.
